original_text: But you must remember to obey me. You must keep the Sabbath day as a special day for me. You must not carry any loads in through Jerusalem's gates on a Sabbath day. If you do not obey this rule, I will burn Jerusalem's gates with fire. The fire will destroy all the strong buildings in Jerusalem. Nobody will be able to stop that fire.” ’ But you must remember to obey me. You must keep the Sabbath day as a special day for me. You must not carry any loads in through Jerusalem's gates on a Sabbath day. If you do not obey this rule, I will burn Jerusalem's gates with fire. The fire will destroy all the strong buildings in Jerusalem. Nobody will be able to stop that fire.” ’
korean_text: 그러나 만일 너희가 나를 순종하지 아니하고 안식일을 거룩되게 아니하여 안식일에 짐을 지고 예루살렘 문으로 들어오면 내가 성문에 불을 놓아 예루살렘 궁전을 삼키게 하리니 그 불이 꺼지지 아니하리라 하셨다 할지니라 하시니라

sentences.original_text: But you must remember to obey me.
sentences.korean_translation: 하지만 너는 나를 순종해야 한다는 것을 기억해야 한다.

sentences.original_text: You must keep the Sabbath day
as a special day for me.
You must not carry any loads
sentences.korean_translation: 너는 어떤 짐도 운반해서는 안 된다.

sentences.original_text: If you do not obey this rule,
sentences.korean_translation: 만약 너희가 이 규칙을 순종하지 않으면,

sentences.original_text: I will burn Jerusalem's gates with fire.
sentences.korean_translation: 나는 불로 예루살렘의 문들을 불태울 것이다.

sentences.original_text: all the strong buildings in Jerusalem.
Nobody will be able to stop that fire.
sentences.korean_translation: 아무도 그 불을 막을 수 없을 것이다.
